import './rightbar.css' import {Users} from "../../dummyData" import Online from '../online/Online' import useEffect from "react" ; const Rightbar = ({user}) => { useEffect(() => { }, []) const HomeRightBar = () => { return <>
Ben Dover and 3 others have a birthday today

Online Friends

    {Users.map(u => ( ))}
} const ProfileRightBar = () => { const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER ; return <>

User Information

City: {user.city}
From: {user.from}
Relationship Status: {user.relationship === 1 ? "Single" : user.relationship === 2 ? "Married" : "-" }

User Friends

Teri Mother
} return (
{user ? : }
) } export default Rightbar
